purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for guanfacine medications.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Medication.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent generic, human use, prescribable guanfacine and guanfacine in combination with other medications.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent non-prescribable, branded drugs and excludes concepts that represent components or ingredients.)
